name: @sassoftware/restaflib
description: collection of useful functions for common scenarios
author: Deva Kumar <deva.kumar@sas.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:web && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:node: rimraf lib && webpack --env target=node p=n --config webpack.config.umd.js && webpack --env target=node p=y --config webpack.config.umd.js
scripts.build:web: rimraf dist && webpack --env target=web p=n --config webpack.config.umd.js && webpack --env target=web p=y --config webpack.config.umd.js
scripts.build:esm: webpack --env target=web p=n --config webpack.esm.config.js && webpack --env target=web p=y --config webpack.esm.config.js
